#summary Collection of software on the UCSB Create + Kinect platform

== Description ==

The first test implements a simple bump bot structure where the Create simply drives forward and try to avoid obstacles.
----
<wiki:video url="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pM_MExbug-s"/>
----
== Dependencies ==
  * [http://www.ros.org/wiki/create_node create_node]
  * std_msgs
  * roscpp
  * pcl
  * pcl_ros
  * pcl_visualization
  * geometry_msgs

== Getting started ==
Checkout the ucsb-ros-pkg repository as instructed on the project home page build this project:
{{{
roscd create_kinect
rosmake
}}}

== Launch files ==
 * *firstTest.launch* - Launch a basic bump bot first test with the Kinect mounted on the Create
